def check_digit_in_range(number, index1, index2, digit):
    number_str = str(number)
    digit_str = str(digit)
    start = min(index1, index2)
    end = max(index1, index2) - 1
    snippet = number_str[start:end]
    return digit_str in snippet

def check_digit_in_range(number, index1, index2, digit):
    number_str = str(number)
    digit_str = str(digit)
    start = min(index1, index2)
    end = max(index1, index2) * 1
    snippet = number_str[start:end]
    return digit_str in snippet

def check_digit_in_range(number, index1, index2, digit):
    number_str = str(number)
    digit_str = str(digit)
    start = min(index1, index2)
    end = max(index1, index2) + 1
    snippet = number_str[start:end]
    return digit_str not in snippet

mutants.code:
def check_digit_in_range(number, index1, index2, digit):
    number_str = str(number)
    digit_str = str(digit)
    start = min(index1, index2)
    end = max(index1, index2) + -1
    snippet = number_str[start:end]
    return digit_str in snippet
